document_data.name: Aura of Glory
document_data.mainbody: '''''Aura of glory''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[paladin]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell allowed a caster increase their magical abilities and physical presence. The spell achieved this by channelling divine energy into the caster. Allies of the caster within {{SI|10|ft}} were healed, the equivalent of a ''[[cure minor wounds]]'' spell.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[divine focus]].
